Description: Banque Saudi Fransi (known as: BSF) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. BSF operates within the Banks sector focusing on Diversified Banks. It has companies operating across the Carribian and Middle East. BSF is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in June 1977.
